NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Ayurveda Therapist and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 05, 2025, 09:21 IST
 National Health Mission
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 05-Aug-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 10,500 to 14,700




FOLLOW

The National Ayush Mission Kerala (NAM) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Ayurveda Therapists, Yoga Instructors, and Multi-Purpose Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma, BAMS, M.Phil, M.Sc, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government JObs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Kerala.

NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Ayurveda Therapist	01	BAMS
Yoga Instructor	01	Diploma, BAMS, M.Phil, M.Sc, Post Graduation
Multi-Purpose Worker	01	12th

Age Limit for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 10,500 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 14,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025
Visit the official Website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Ayurveda Therapist notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form.
Then, send the application form along with the documents required to the address given below.

Address

District Programme Manager, District Programme Management and Supporting Unit, National AYUSH Mission, Orikompil Building 2nd Floor, Melevettipuram, Pathanamthitta-689645

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	01-08-2025
Last Date of Application	13-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
